author: GeeterSkeeter#8008
name: VCDeafenMuteCheck
short: Check deafened and muted users in voice channels
description: This cog checks for users who have been deafened and muted in a voice channel for 1 hour. The bot will send them a DM asking if they're still online, and if they don't reply with 'yes' within 10 minutes, they will be moved to the AFK voice channel.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
